name: C.H.A.S.E.D. (Demo)
description:
C.H.A.S.E.D.  is a playable arcade game from 2 to 4 players locally with a Top-Down camera. The mechanics of the game is based on a constant imbalance, rebalanced every X seconds (definition of the game mode), between players with a larger size to those who are smaller. The most imposing ones can destroy the smaller ones. The game offers various game modes on this principle.The games are held in arenas characterized by mechanisms such as obstacles, dangerous areas, teleporters or accelerators.

On this demo you will have acces to 3 map from 2 different world
